# description(options:)

**Instance Method**

Generates a string description of the filled column.

## Declaration

```swift
func description(options: FormattingOptions) -> String
```

## Parameters

- **options**: The formatting options.

## Describing a Column

- **description**: A mirror that reflects the filled column.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the filled column suitable for debugging.

items.description: A mirror that reflects the filled column.
